name: Vasilis Papadopoulos
personality: Disciplined and dependable, with a dry sense of humor.
story: Growing up in Athens, Vasilis always dreamed of serving in the military. After completing his mandatory service, he joined the Greek Army and served in various peacekeeping missions overseas. He later joined the Arma 3 Independent faction and was quickly promoted to the rank of Sergeant for his exceptional leadership skills. Vasilis is now part of the crew for a tank unit, ensuring that his team members are always ready for combat.
